website_summaries.verdict: A large, smooth surface with plenty of room for a keyboard and mouse, and multiple color options available for the fashion-conscious.
pros: Can reverse and use the silver side without losing functionality
pad does not get marred when sharp pens or pencils used
Included strap holds it in a tubular shape if transporting from place to place
cons: Some users did not like the strong odor straight out of the packaging tube, but said it cleared up after airing out

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Pad!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk pad to cover a big scratch on my IKEA desk and I love it. I got the 35.4" x 17" size which I recommend if you have a larger size desk. It's a very comfortable and non-slip surface on the top. The pink one is not a bright pink, it's a deeper blush pink. It does move around on the desk a little bit, so what I did is put some tape under it so it wouldn't slide around. All in all, I love this desk pad for both appearance and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Just what you expect and want
customer_reviews.text: First this product is a great size. Got it less for a computer mat and more for a craft mat to work and take pictures on. The size easily fits my mid size laptop and mouse with room to spare. The mat is thick and feels sturdy (heavy enough to hold itself down. The mat comes in a awesome tube package that you can reuse. Also has a strap to hold the mat together rolled up to use if you want to travel with the mat. Have no negatives. My photos don't pick up the color well but it is just as pictured. (iPad 2018 is used in pictures for size reference)
customer_reviews.author: whit

customer_reviews.title: No need for a mouse pad!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good desk mat, no need for a mouse pad! And protects your desk from scratches. I dropped a hard text book on top of the mat by accident, and the corner hit it, I thought I ruined it and created a dent, but it went back to how I was. So it’s really good!
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Its Purdy
customer_reviews.text: It comes rolled up, just lay it flat, put some books on it for a while, flip it over and do the same. It looks great and it is also a giant mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: r. Blondel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: The mat came well protected rolled up in a solid tube. It took a few days to settle on the edges, but flattened out with no issue. It has a very subtle texture that does not prevent writing notes/checks/etc directly on the pad. I've placed a few vinyl stickers on the mat using a vinyl cutter to add some personal flavor, and there is no issues with them adhering. My only recommendation would be that if you are used to a slightly softer mouse pad, look into a wrist wrest or similar. After 1 week, I can definitely tell a difference from the harder desk mat from the softer mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Herold

customer_reviews.title: Functional & cute but a slides a bit-
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It makes my black desk look so much cuter and girly. I have to say that it does slide a little but sometimes if I bump the edge of it butnother than that it is awesome. Great for working on videos and graphics because it’s large enough that I don’t find my mouse falling off the edge. Smooth and lays flat. I put stuff on the edges to flatten it quicker. 4 stars just because it slides sometimes but honestly I still recommend it. Gives your desk a pop of color while also being very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Raelin

customer_reviews.title: It's a desk pad & it does its job
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say other than it functions as one would expect a deskpad to. It may be a little stiff at first, but like any pad just iron it out with a little counterweight and it stays perfectly flat. Fits nicely with my 10-keyless keyboard, so it may be a little more cramped if you have a fuil sized one. It's also not bad at keeping heat from reaching my glass desk under it if anyone else is concerned about that. No issues with mouse tracking (Corsair Scimitar Pro RBG @ 3000 dpi).
customer_reviews.author: N. Cole

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered an inexpensive unit to get an idea of the size and use on my new office desk. Had then planned to purchase a nice leather desk pad. I like this one so much I will not re[lace it. It's functional, easy to clean, and best of all looks good on the desk. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: iowa

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This thing will have zero grip on your desk, if you just look at it the wrong way it will move. Also the surface likes to stick to my mouse when ever I move to click on something, which leads to it moving the entire thing. The edges are also extremely rough so moving your arm across this thing gets uncomfortable really fast. This thing has a ton of little things that irritate the hell out of me, I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office
customer_reviews.text: We have a solid oak desk that is used to work from home. Started to have issues with the mouse dragging on the desk top and the grains in the desk causing pen issues when only one sheet of paper was being used. Researched desk pads for weeks and so glad we chose this one. Does not slide around on our desk, mouse works beautifully now. Still possible to poke through just one sheet of paper when writing but prefer a slightly soft surface over a hard one. Wish we would have gotten this ages ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: not all its chalked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: The mat works as a mat, but my drawing tablet, keyboard, etc. all slip off. There isnt a bit of grip on the mat either as it slides on my desk too if you move a bit too much. I've had it laid out for over a week with items on it and the edges are still not laying flat. Material is nice looking and feels durable, but again I was looking for something that didnt slip n slide and this aint it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Valde

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed my finish
customer_reviews.text: Works great on top to avoid scratches. But on the bottom it’s eating your finish and bonding to it. DO NOT PUT THIS ON YOUR WOOD FURNITURE!!!!!!! It was good finish. Furniture was from Darvin. A reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk pad choice
customer_reviews.text: This product came on time and was as described by the owner and I've enjoyed this piece thus far on my new desk set up. The mat is soft, resilient, and seems to hold up to writing on it quite well. I've had previous desk pads that the writing stays imprinted on for a little while and that's always made me a little unhappy. The black desk mat that I received is not a faded black, but a nice solid black with a nice leather simulation that isn't too deep to interfere with writing. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Love the black
customer_reviews.text: Love the black. I write on papers on it without a hard surface using mechanical pencils and pens all the time. I think a have a hard hand when writing but I have had no problem. Sometimes I do my make up at the desk as well and get concealer on it. If I wipe it off with my finger you can see the smear, it's quite obvious. I just use a wipe to clean it though and it's back to black. Very nice. It does come rolled up in the packaging but after a day it flattens out.
customer_reviews.author: CVisser

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Material never lays completely flat. It rips easily. Absorbs body oil & is difficult to clean. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Cutest & Toughest Mouse Pad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this desk pad for a month! Bought it to cover the scratches on my desk and to use it as a mouse pad. Here’s what I noticed: •The color is just as described: like a rose pink! •The material makes it easy to clean: which is good cause I eat on my desk a lot! •The thick texture makes it easy to write without punching holes in the paper: I use my desk to study a lot! •The mouse glides nicely across it: great since I play video games! •No signs of cracking or tears after everyday use. TBH no cons about the product! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Magaly Garduno

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. It is exactly as depicted. I have it on my dining table as a protection for when I use my laptop. The size is just right and holds a laptop, a typing stand and room for a mouse, glass, etc.. The color even fits our decor. Sturdy product and good quality. It came rolled up and it rolled out flat. It can easily be rolled back up and stored in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color and size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 23.6" x13.7" desk pad in glaucous green + orange. I considered the two other larger sizes, but I'm glad I went with the smallest size. It's perfect for my Apple wireless keyboard and mouse. It protects the main work area of my desk while not interfering with my laptop/external monitor arrangement and other desktop items. The colors are even better than I had expected. the orange is more of a soft peach color, and the green is a silvery sage color. The pad arrived rolled with tissue paper in a sturdy box with an enclosed silica packet. The box arrived undamaged, even though the Amazon shipping envelope had a couple of tears in it. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: I.M. Reading

customer_reviews.title: Pen or Pencil Punctures Through Paper
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you plan to write on this. Pen or pencil will puncture paper.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Helps the desk though seems permanently curled up
customer_reviews.text: I have stuck down the corners, placed heavy objects on all sides, even warmed up with a blow dryer to try and get this to fully flatten out but haven't been able to. Otherwise, I do feel that I would like this. The copper color I got is a bit uglier in person than I would have hoped, but I just ended up having the other side face up. Using double stick adhesive has worked the best to just keep it in place and the corners as flat as I could (but does cause a bump when trying to write on the flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: It's like a giant mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of like having a giant mouse pad, but I love this. It makes me feel like I have a nicer desk without actually upgrading the desk. It obviously doesnt cover my whole desk, but it's big enough to cover my main work space. The keyboard doesnt slide around, and the mouse is very responsive (hence the giant mouse pad comparrison) I got mine in black. I've been using it for about 6 months and it still looks brand new. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for home or office, durable and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: We have four of these desk pads, two in our home offices, and two at our regular offices, and I am purchasing another for travel. The new laser mice work well, but some surfaces still have issues with proper tracking. NOT this pad, all the mice we use function perfectly, and this pad gives me ample space for keyboard, mouse and speaker use. It is easy to clean, and very durable. I highly recommend this product for anyone who uses a computer at home or work.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetMedic

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly- this is decidedly NOT lemon yellow and pink. It’s bright lime green and pink, and not even a decent lime green. It’s got a strange undertone to it, almost olive in nature. I could have gotten over the weird color, but my computer mouse had the worst time trying to navigate this surface. It constantly wouldn’t work and I would have to move to another surface on my desk to get my mouse to move. Totally defeated the purpose. Those two pretty significant issues combined has made me decide to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: KBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Ends curled
customer_reviews.text: Desk mat arrived quickly and undismayed. Looks like product description however it was shipped rolled with to side in so the ends curl outward. Tried rolling top side out and also putting weights on curled ends but after 2 weeks it seems the curls are permanent. They should roll it good side out for shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Comes rolled and will stay that way forever. Would return but it’s not worth the headache. In the trash
customer_reviews.author: CO_der

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look smooth
customer_reviews.text: It comes rolled up. After unrolling it I noticed it didn't look smooth but had multiple waves in its appearance. Not as bad as wrinkles but still unpleasant looking. I though maybe it just needed time to straighten out. I helped it do this by putting books on it. While it laid flat it still had the wavy appearance. I returned it. I will buy a different, more expensive brand that comes already flat.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing way more than I thought I would! I've always hated how little surface area mousepads had, but I had no idea desk pads existed until I was randomly browsing through Amazon. I purchased the pink one, and it is the perfect addition to my white/pink home office! It works perfectly as a mousepad, but I love that I now have a place to put hot/cold drinks without damaging the desk. I purchased the smallest size, which is absolutely large enough for the corner of my desk where I work. It came rolled up in a tube, but it unrolled flat, no curled edges whatsoever! Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: rigashi

customer_reviews.title: Thin and Slips
customer_reviews.text: I have used a desk pad for the past 7 years (not sure where it was purchased) that is quite thick, durable, and never stains. So, in comparison, I'm not impressed with this new one (for a second desk) that is quite thin and doesn't seem nearly as durable. The table on which it is used has some unevenness, and this desk pad does nothing to compensate. Also, there's no grip on this pad, so it shifts around.
customer_reviews.author: jdragonfly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE !
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these! One for my desk, and the other for the dresses which I use as a makeup table. It is amazing, perfect sizing and the material is great. Super easy to clean, it also works great as a mousepad( with some mouse like Logitech ) The colour is true as the picture. The packaging was great and if you ever want to roll up it comes with a band that keeps it in place. Its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased, but one downside.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with this mat. It’s professional and durable and gets the job done. The packaging is also really impressive I must say. After going to one of these types of mats, you’ll never want a simple mouse pad again. The only downside is the fact that it tends to be a bit slip and slidey at times due to it being dual sided. It doesn’t have that neoprene grip under side. As a solution I picked my favorite side, bought a roll of neoprene and made my own neoprene grip side. It truly made this into the perfect desk mat. If this came with it already, this would be a perfect 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Bear

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous addition to my desk!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this pad to protect an antique desk I received from my father. I had been using a desk top calendar but it really didn't work very well. It kep sliding all over the place. I saw these pads and thought I would give it a try. I am so pleased that I did. It is very high quality. Soft but not too thick. I accidently marked on it with an ink pad and thought I had ruined it but some non-acetate nail polish remover took off the ink and left no after effect to the rubber or the color. I highly recommend this product and will be purchasing another one for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Smith

customer_reviews.title: not the same color as in the picture, and it smells!!
customer_reviews.text: must be kidding, the color looks nothing like in the picture, don't like it and it has a smell, not sure if it will be better after a few days using. unhappy, not worth the money, especially the color have to return it, the smell doesn't go away!! does anybody have a nose?? and i have to go out to print the label for 1$ myself! suck shopping experience!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: So much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This desk pad is wonderful. I have a 17 inch laptop and there is plenty of room on each side to set things down. Now I don't need a mouse pad, which was always in the way, and this desk pad grips better. I can use my mouse, set my coffee down, along with anything else. I pulled the desk pad forward just a bit to protect the edge of my desk, which was getting worn by the edge of my hand holding the mouse. This desk pad is beautifully protecting my desk, looks fantastic, and I could not be more pleased with this product. Really high quality. I also bought one for my son's desk!
customer_reviews.author: PN Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Quality product looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, packaging was very professional, flattened out quickly even though it came rolled. Cleans easily by wiping down with a dry or damp cloth. I picked the teal color, and has a reverse color of light green. I would say this is a quality product to have if looking for a desk mat to add color, or to lay over a glasstop desk. I purchased because my Computer on the corner portion of the desk. I needed something that covered the meeting edges. My mouse had issues previously gliding, so this serves two purposes, covering the connected piece gap, and allows my mouse to move without a mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: SouthLaneDesigns

customer_reviews.title: No real problems
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and purpose of this. It s perfect size. I do like the material it’s made of....you can writer on a piece of paper on it without sinking in much. I wish it was a little thicker. I wish I got a lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alright for its money
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks pretty good, especially in the red color. The only problems are that its been a month now and the corners are still lifting up and this can get pretty annoying after you keep bumping into it and making the mat move. Another issue is that the mat is not grippy at all. It will always slide around unless you secure it to your table with some tape or something. - other than that it was a nice long mat that also doubles as a mousepad
customer_reviews.author: Saagar

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk pad that does the job so far
customer_reviews.text: As others have written, the first shock is that the Bronze color is actually quite glossy and bronze! Not really like the brown in the picture, so be forewarned. There are 2 sides to it, with one side being darker and the other this very shiny penny look. The mat comes curled up so it takes a few days for it to flatten out, there was not much smell either to air out. Cannot complain, and I bought 2 more for my inlaws as a gift so that they could cover another surface. Questions sent to seller were answered quite promptly. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: Both times I purchased this it came undamaged. The pink is a little pinker than it looks in the photo, but it's still really nice. It's super easy to clean, and is very useful since I tend to get a little wild with my mouse and a normal mousepad is wayyy too small. Only regret is that I got both in pink. One pad sits on a normal plastic desk and is fine, however the other sits on a wood desk and it does slide a little - might put a couple wash cloths underneath to hold it in place. I would buy again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sara G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Hi Weber, thank you for contacting. I love the colors of my Desk pad, and it is soft enough to support me doing schoolwork without my pen squishing right through the paper. The only complaint I have is the strap put around the rolled up pad is too small. I found it impossible to roll it up tight enough to attach the strap, and it makes sense why it was loose in the box and not already on. This is a very small complaint, as I will likely never need to move the pad from my desk and will likely lose the strap anyways. Thank you, and have a wonderful day!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie K Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Missing the belt, disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pad I got the black one, it’s smooth, you can write on toP with paper no problem, I would have given 5 star but I was missing the belt and I actually chose this pad because I wanted to use it to carry along and use it on the table for when doing makeup put the product and be able to disinfect it with no problem but like the idea of the lil belt that it came with but mines didn’t come with any it came loose now I have to use a rubber band 🤷🏽‍♀️ Doesn’t look professional.
customer_reviews.author: isaura

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: I have had the desk pads for 2 weeks so I cannot judge their durability. But I love the way they look. I ordered the green/blue & the only come in the smaller size so I ordered 2 & put them side by side. Some reviewers have complained that the ends stick up but I have not had that experience at all. They lay 100% flat. It protects my desk and it makes it look welcoming. I love the colors. It is easy to write on. Measure your desk and pay attention to the measurements listed for the product so that you have the right fit before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Donna, South Fla.

customer_reviews.title: Disco copper not brown color
customer_reviews.text: I recommend black, I've should have checked the comments first because now I see why most of the complaints are due to the color. Likes: Longer than most desk pads, waterproof Dislikes: Brown color is more shiny copper, very disco reflective like, it's definitely not brown. Slips a little bit
customer_reviews.author: SD GUY

customer_reviews.title: We have a winner
customer_reviews.text: I like this. The large mouse pads over time fall apart and u spill on those and it's an awef mess. This product is clean, sleek, pleasing to the eye. Thin and flexible but strong. Didnt take long to relax after opening after it came rolled up tight. Spills wipe right up. I thought it may look cheap or feel weak, I was sk wrong. I'm glad I went this route. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: · -;·Deanna.Clark·;- ·

customer_reviews.title: Smells Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd desk pad I have purchased. The first was the smaller one and is great. The medium sized gray cork smells terrible. I have had it 6 weeks and have tried leaving it outside and wiping it down and it still smells awful. The best I can describe it is like mothballs. The pad itself is fine but can't deal with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: B. Branum

customer_reviews.title: Nice but doesn’t flatten easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this weeks ago and have had magazines sitting on the edges for weeks waiting for it to fully flatten. It’s a beautiful color but a arrived rolled and very difficult to undo the rolled edges.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Pink
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect for me. I needed a soft pink color and this matches the picture perfectly. My picture it looks a little off I think because of lighting, but it is exactly what is advertised. It is a little on the thin side but I'm not bothered too much by it. I bought this to cover my desk top since I already have some scratches and ring marks and don't want to make it any worse. The other side is a pretty metallic silver color so it can be reversible if you want. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk pad, terrible mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my desk to give me extra protection and comfort on my tempered glass tabletop. For that purpose it's awesome. As a mouse-pad it's awful. The material provides a lot of friction and due to it's soft and textured surface, it ends up gripping your mouse, so you really have to work to move your mouse. I use a hard mousepad on top of it and it works great. I don't regret the purchase, but I expected the material and texture to provide resistance to the mouse feet, so no big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this, I like the look of this but for some reason it has a somewhat sticky feel on my mouse. As my mouse moves around it wants to just pop pop pop back-and-forth as a post to being really smooth. I still use this but I would not recommend it for someone else. As a matter fact, I have a second office desk and I will not be purchasing one of these for that desk. I've even tried to use a different cleaner and see if I could get something to make it smooth but nothing seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not pink
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described in terms of size, but the color is completely off. As you can see from my photo, the sticker shows that the mat should be more like a light or pale pink. The item is actually more like a peachy salmon. Unfortunately, I bought it to go with a whole set of other stuff for my desk in shades of pink. I'm just going to keep it because the size is nice, but I would caution you that it is definitely *not pink*. Not baby pink , not light pink, not bubblegum pink. It is a peach-tan-salmon mashup.
customer_reviews.author: girl2012

customer_reviews.title: Don’t cheap out on mousepads!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give bad reviews but this mousepad deserves it. A badly packaged mousepad with a non-slippery surface that gives a hard time for mice aswell as a bubbly and wrinkled surface. The mousepad itself also does not conform to a flat surface and the corners want to lift up, overall, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alen Khachatryan

customer_reviews.title: finally
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea. Finally a mouse pad bigger than my reach. I have a black leather desktop and this matches perfectly, but it wouldn't matter. It's amazing. Also, don't worry about spilling my coffee. The problem that provoked this purchase was that the cute little mouse pad I was using suddenly didn't seem to have the traction it needed to work the mouse, and small mouse pads have always been annoying because I'd have to keep readjusting my position. No more. This is definitely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: XOXOXO

customer_reviews.title: Best you could have for such price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small table which has my Mac Monitor and Keyboard and Alexa on it. It's been in the house for about 10 years, so I was thinking about getting rid of the table because the top was fading in some areas. I bought this and put it in the table. It's a life changer, I have gotten so many compliments on the set up it's crazy. I got the orange one and it contrasts so good with the light blue walls in my room. And the material is definitely great
customer_reviews.author: Wriel Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, helped release strain on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: Now that I'm working from home I needed a few things to make my "new" office more ergonomic. The YSAGi Multifunctional Office Desk Pad has helped me to increase my workable space as I'm not limited to the area of my mouse pad. It has also helped with the strain on my right wrist; I have carpal tunnel in that wrist so have to be careful. That wasn't why I bought it so that has been a surprising bonus! I bought the Lilac and it's a nice pick me up on my gray work space.
customer_reviews.author: DMurph

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a recommendation from a family member. They are the best. They clean very easily. For pencil I use magic eraser, most everything else cleans with a wet paper towel. They make using a mouse during distance learning easy and keep my kids' desks from being gouged and damaged super quickly. I have 2 currently, but the husband wants one too for his desk. The gray color is very nice. It's a very very light gray but there's still a noticeable difference between it and a white desk.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect colorful desk pad!
customer_reviews.text: This desk pad works perfectly for my daughters desk. It’s a pretty color which she loves, and I was able to easily cut it down to size with a regular pair of scissors to fit her small desk, including a small circular cut out to accommodate the hole in her desk that her charging cables go through. It lays nice and flat almost immediately out of the box and is not stiff. It’s easy to wipe down and keep clean. It’s exactly what I was looking for to protect the surface of her desk.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, great price, will provide a good surface to write and use your mouse!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product which was very nice and smooth - easy to use as a mouse pad and to write on. In fact our office only orders these type pads for the professionals and orders from a formal office supply store. Those for the professionals are very thin and hard and also at least four times the price of this Amazon offering. Since the staff have to order their own I have suggested to everyone to get theirs from this supplier! I love the color choice and since it is reversible I can change when I want a different look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I bought them for
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty darn sure these are plastic and not leather as suggested in description but they look nice enough for what I got them for. I got these to too our night stands to prevent scratches and chips. I measured to get the right size but they did perfectly, look better than placemats that we used before and I am satisfied with for that. If I bought for an office use I think I’d be bugged about the quality/look and would spend some more money for a nicer leather writing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat, some reviewers said that they needed to use books to help flatten it as it comes rolled up but I did not need to. I unrolled the mat, put it on the table and sat my laptop on it, nothing else needed. It is a good size so I am to have my laptop, cell phone stand and a coffee mug on it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy one now!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal...I ordered a second one for another desk as a result. What more can you or do you expect, the price is amazing, quality way higher than the price, next day shipping, packed very nicely...? They offer various colors and sizes and if you want a quality, good looking desk mat (and you can eliminate ugly mouse pad) then buy one...you can't go wrong. I bought a more expensive one at the same time and it stinks compared to this one in every category... I need to check what other items they sell, this is one of the good ones to do business with... -P
customer_reviews.author: P 6 1 9 M D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Wrong Color For Me
customer_reviews.text: I order a pink desk pad and was quite disappointed when I opened the package and found it was more salmon than pink. However, the flip side was silver and the mat is reversible. I can live with the silver color. I love the ability to leave my mouse anywhere on the pad and I also like the fact that my laptop doesn't scratch the table. I can set a glass of water on the pad and easily wipe up any condensation left behind. Great product. Just don't order pink unless you want salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Glassyaya

customer_reviews.title: Won’t lay flat, harsh edge
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t lay flat. Left heavy books on it for days. Got kind of flat... now I’m editing this because another week later and it’s curled back up on itself. The edge is harsh. Would prefer the material to have been cut, then the edges rolled under and stitched, creating a soft rounded edge. The sharp cut edge irritates my arms and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this desktop pad for my office space... it is big enough to cover the entire space use and also protects my wooden desk from getting scratched from my mouse and also from any other items that are being place and moved with the area. It is also versatile because I have 2 sides to choose (1 different m color tone for each side) from to change the looks. I definitely buy another if I have too but from the looks of it, the quality will last me a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Skelley

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to move mouse on that surface
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful color mat. It took a few days for it to straighten out. Looks great on a desk. Few cons: it is difficult to move the mouse on this surface. It feels like a lot of friction, so I gave up as my hand was getting tired. When I wear short sleeves, my hand gets sweaty, leaving a wet spot every time I lift my hand. With long sleeve shirts, it works great. Overall: I am looking for another pad, however, if you are not using a mouse, then this may be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Slides Around on Table Top
customer_reviews.text: I'm using a Lifetime table as a desk/computer workstation and thought it would be nice to have a desk pad under my keyboard and mouse. It looks nice but it slides around continuously as I work. I blame myself as I have used other mats that had a bit of tack to the bottom side to prevent them from sliding, but they are more expensive and I decided to save some money. After I tape this thing down I'm sure it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: ThatOneGuy

customer_reviews.title: Ends won’t stay down!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this pad, I was impressed at first. The material seemed pretty decent, color was nice, and overall a good feel. It came rolled up and I figured putting it under heavy items would help flatten it out. It has been almost a week now and the ends are still rolled up. Not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jarvi

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wooden top draft desk and I don't like the sound or feel the mouse makes sliding across it. For some reason, I move my mouse all over the place and needed a large pad :). I got the office desk pad in black. Shipping was on time no hassle. And presentation of the item was very nice. I laid the pad out and put a few items on the side to flatten it down - no worries there either. It is a stunning rich black and works perfectly. I have recommended this to my team and would buy it again if I had another desk.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Still wonderful, months later!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blotter. It’s not real leather so it’s animal-friendly, and it’s large enough for my full-sized keyboard with plenty of room to spare. I also love that I no longer have to confine my mouse to a tiny mousepad - the whole blotter is a mousepad! I’ve been using this for months and not a single complaint - except that it’s slippery on the underside so it does move around. HOWEVER, I solved that problem with a little double-sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jean

customer_reviews.title: Not pink
customer_reviews.text: It's not pink..its like a dirty brown pink...I am very disappointed ..I included pink items I had on top of it, a pink fan and pink nail file case. Compared to the rest of my pink room this doesn't go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The biggest thing I worried about was color.I did not want a loud lime green. Thankfully the light green color is accurate and exactly like photo. Both sides are the same so it can be flipped over. Unrolled nicely and has a nice weight to it so it seems like it will flatten out easily. It's thin and smooth but doesn't slide or move.Great product so far and awesome addition to a boring work desk. If it starts to prematurely wear out then I will update this rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Sleek Rose Gold Desk Pad!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these rose gold pads for both of my desks at my house. It is very well made and easy to wipe and clean. The rose gold is a pretty pink with a shimmer that shines in the sunlight. The pad is a good thickness and makes writing easier and more comfortable for my wrists. I got the biggest size which is perfect and covers like half my desk. I keep my electronics on it and my planner and desk essentials. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Ikea MICKE desk (the smaller one). It's the perfect size for my MacBook Pro and mouse and looks great! My only con is that there's no grip on the bottom, but since my laptop is sitting on it, I've never had an issue with it slipping. It's also neat that it comes with a clasp to roll it up and secure it (although I rarely take it anywhere). The material is very sturdy and good quality. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second pad that I’ve ordered from this company and I love both of them! The first one I ordered was a mint green color and then I decided when they came out with a lavender keyboard that I was going to get the lavender one and it’s perfect color is more on the mall side than lavender though but it’s purple so I’m good. You may have to flatten it out a little bit before you use it but it works very well
customer_reviews.author: kbb

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 5 stars because it fits all the descriptions completely. I bought 2 of the larger pink and purple ones for my L shaped desk. The wood is very easy to scratch and these fit perfect to protect a large amount of the desk. The colors are amazing and bright. These are VERY easy to clean and completely reversible. AMAZING.. They are fairly thin but that is what i was looking for. Soft to the touch and didnt have an odor like some similar products i have had.
customer_reviews.author: Bubajuja

customer_reviews.title: Good desk protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter a new desk and I didn’t want her to mess it up with writing and this is the best! She slides her chrome book around a lot and I’m glad I bought this or else this desk would be a mess. Very easy to clean! Did come rolled up but once I laid it down and put some books on top, it flattened out nicely. Got her one in grey and I ended up getting a purple one for myself. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Bought two!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pad. I bought the first one to try it out and was so impressed I got another! They come rolled up, understandably so, so when laid out they are not 100% flat. A heat gun on low heat solved that on the first one and I just let the second one lie and it turned itself flat after a few days (even in my cool basement). They clean very easy with simple soap and water. They're durable and keep flat and looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not very durable
customer_reviews.text: While I do like this mat, this has a particular defect. The edges would warp upwards after a little more than a week of use, at that time I had to flip the mat over. This cycle would continue to a point where it's very annoying. I contacted the seller and they told me this happens the first time I used it and just flip it over. I responded to the seller which I have been doing this process for a few times and it's annoying. No response. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS...
customer_reviews.author: Aw

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Pad
customer_reviews.text: The pad is great and is as described in listing. Not slippery at all and looks very nice. Big enough for full size Microsoft keyboard and a mouse. Keyboard does not move around at all while typing and the pad itself doesn't slip or move on the desktop. Would recommend this product to anyone wanting a nice desk pad. Just got the pad so can't rate the durability but looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: Not a great surface for a mouse
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good-quality product. I liked the material, but the problem was that it is more similar to faux leather than it it so the more typical mousepad material, and my mouse didn't glide on it as well as it needs to, particularly for more precise movements. I returned it and bought this one instead:
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk pad for ambidextrous double mouse users
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk pad so much that I have one at home and one in the office. The color is perfect and the surface so pleasing that I leave it on my dark green table/desk at home and just dust it every week. It's easy to clean and water beads up on it rather than soaking in. It's wide enough for two mice and a keyboard. I use both hands for work on the computer so this size is perfect. Great deal for cost too.
customer_reviews.author: dc customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not lie flat. Very thick and slides.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this desk mat. It does not lie flat, thick, (scratch my arms) and slides on the desk so bad you can not keep it in place on the desk, and it took over a week putting heavy things on it just to get it unrolled. Do not waste your money on this mat!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: So simple so obvious and yet such a big help
customer_reviews.text: I have an old wooden desk, not so smooth. I put this mat on and it lightens up and warms the reflection onto my face for video calls, helps my mouse and keyboard move arounds smoothly, and keeps everything clean and neat. It's thin enough that I can have my monitor stand and laptop stand partly on, partly off the mat and it's not an issue. But thick enough that it doesn't ruck up as I move things about on it. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Busadreamer

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk protection at a super price.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but description and reviews could be misleading. My desk mat came in a box not a tube but that doesn’t bother me. There was a plastic/vinyl smell when I took it out which went away as it aired out. Mine is not dual colored, it’s just black with a smooth side and a textured side. The mat does slide around a bit on my wood desk unlike some reviews state it doesn’t. Overall it’s a nice desk mat that should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, but be aware of the color choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and wide desk mat. The pink is not bright or vibrant. It is more of a mauve-pink. The photos posted by reviewers referencing this are spot on. After reading the reviews, I decided it didn't really matter if it was a true pink, but if you are basing your decision on the color, look elsewhere. Other than that, it's a nice wide size, it's a slightly metallic silver on the bottom, and it wipes clean easily. I took a star because the color option is not a true depiction of what it looks like in person.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Purchase hates Toast

customer_reviews.title: Great every use for laptop/desktop users
customer_reviews.text: The feel and softness adds the right amount of cushion for laptop/desktop/mouse users. Size is great as it covers the necessary area of workspace. Wish I ordered the largest size available to cover my entire desk but this works for now. Product material and finish very high quality. Haven’t gotten any ink smudges yet but hopefully the material is easy to clean, looks and feels like leather.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery to use and not practical
customer_reviews.text: The Mouse pad is well made but has a very smooth surface and slips on my desk every time I start typing - which is highly annoying and makes the mouse pad pretty much unusable. Hopefully it might work for your desk surface. Other than the highly glossy and smooth surface, the product seems be of good quality and well made. There was no chemical smell and lays pretty flat - it just didn't work for me and i can't see how a smooth glossy surface would stay in place on any normal desk.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Grape is Not Grape!!
customer_reviews.text: My only real problem with this product is the color is described as Grape. Grapes are purple!! This thing is maroon which is nowhere near purple. Its useable but i dont exactly like it and will not order it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for desk
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. The first one I purchased over a year ago and it has held up well. My old desktop blotter left the foam backing on my desk with a film. This has a smooth finish on both sides and does not mar the desk. I purchase the second one and cut it to fit the space I wanted it for. I would definitely recommend this and will probably be purchasing two more for my other desks.
customer_reviews.author: AlaynaVA

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat came packaged beautifully wrapped and unrolled with no ridges. I am using it on a table partially as a place mat and also for my laptop. I love that it covers the whole end of the table. It's easy to wipe off and is soft too. I'll probably get some smaller size ones for use as placemats. Seller sent immediately and followed up with nice email. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mousepad
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It feels nice and looks nice. However, I do not recommend this as a mouse pad. The material is pretty “grippy” and it makes it difficult to use the mouse. You cannot move the cursor smoothly with this. I still have to use the mousepad I was supposed to be replacing when I purchased this. If you are looking for a big mousepad, this is not the right product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly does the job
customer_reviews.text: I received that desk mat 2 months ago. It comes rolled, but, unlike what some other reviews might say, it unrolls very easily, the corners don't point out. And there is no smell at all after 2 days. Stays perfectly in place on my desk, the mouse slides on it normally - a little bit too slow if anything, so I changed my mouse's pointer setting. And it's not abrasive when the arm slides on its edge. After 2 months of daily use, it doesn't have a stain or any mark. An excellent product, I will actually buy another one for another desk
customer_reviews.author: Severin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my home desk
customer_reviews.text: Now that I need to work from home, I bought this to protect my desk from scratches. My notebook fits great and I no longer need a separate mousepad either. I bought the large one, which at first was too big, but I'm keeping it because it keeps a larger area of my desk protected if I'm having coffee or water at my desk and I do not need a coaster either. The pink color is nice and light colored, too.
customer_reviews.author: jenniferk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a slide out tray that both my keyboard and mouse sit on. This pad fits it within 1/4" on both sides. It is super durable, attractive and especially nice because I don't need a small mouse pad anymore. This surface gives me plenty of room to move around. I am a builder and have to look at large plans. Now, with this pad, I can scroll the plan all in one motion as opposed to pulling and resetting on my original mouse pad. I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: More beige than pink
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in navy and love it so I decided to buy the pink. The color upon arrival however is more of a “slightly tan Caucasian” than a pink (see pic). It does not match the description picture at all. This is disappointing since the color makes it drab instead of feminine. I will be returning and just getting another navy instead.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk pad to cover a big scratch on my IKEA desk and I love it. I got the 35.4" x 17" size which I recommend if you have a larger size desk. It's a very comfortable and non-slip surface on the top. The pink one is not a bright pink, it's a deeper blush pink. It does move around on the desk a little bit, so what I did is put some tape under it so it wouldn't slide around. All in all, I love this desk pad for both appearance and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Melanee McKee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessories for my desk!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for about 2 months. I bought one to be a replacement under my 27” iMac (the last one stuck to my desk and caused damage - different brand) and another one to go under my laptop on the return side of my desk. Absolutely love these! Easy to clean, I can write on paper and no dips in it from my handwriting, very nice sizes. They came rolled up and I was worried they wouldn’t lay flat. No worries! Took about two minutes for them to conform to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Farmwife

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my outside office
customer_reviews.text: With the weather being nice (most days) and working from home I bought this to use as a work surface on my deck table where I spend much of my time working. I unroll it every morning and set it out on the table and it works great for my purposes (under my keyboard and mouse). So far it's doing well, it seems pretty durable, and after rolling it and unrolling it several times per week it shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hannemann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice desk pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk pad - good thickness, stays put on a wood desk top, computer and other items don't slide around, and has enought texture to use an optical mouse on it, so no need for a separate mouse pad with your computer. It takes the occassional poke with a pen point or sharp object without leaving a permanent marks, at least so far. Priced right.
customer_reviews.author: pksimons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rose Pink Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and the color of this desk pad. It's perfect for my wireless mouse, I don't worry about my coffee cup leaving a ring on the desk anymore, and it provides just the right amount of soft pink to make my home office pretty without being over the top. I bought the middle size, but I would go larger if I was buying it again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: I have a glass top desk and this is exactly what I needed to write & use my mouse
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and durable. Fits well on my desk and allows me to use my mouse and also to write on paper without being directly on glass. I got the light dusty rose/pink and it looks tan with my office light on. I'm happy with this and would recommend. Really glad I didn't spend the money to get the leather fancy desk mat set - this is perfect. I probably will never take it anywhere, but it does come with a strap and it would work easily if you need to take your desk mat with you.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this desk pad. Compared to my old mouse pad, I can literally stretch my arms and mouse without feeling limited to a 6"x6" space. I only wish that it had some sort of subtle rubber padding to keep my laptop in place but it doesn't bother me too much. Not only is a good functional product, it's actually pleasant to look at also. I bought the navy blue one and would definitely buy something like this for anyone whose work/hobby is tied to their computer!
customer_reviews.author: Lue Xiong
